item.description:
Hi again, this next Meetup will be at Moe's right near Webster Square (end of Main Street and Park Ave). They have lots of tasty vegan options at a good price, and the frozen margueritas are good too.

CARPOOLING IS AVAILABLE!!!!!!!!!

For help with directions or if you have questions, call Stephen (me) at (508) 410-3172. Thanks!
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp March Meeting
